original_text: We told you that our Lord Jesus Christ is powerful. We also told you that he will return to earth again. We were not telling you false stories that came from people's clever ideas. Instead, we were telling you what we ourselves had seen. We ourselves saw that the Lord Jesus is very great. 17-
korean_text: 우리 주 예수 그리스도의 능력과 강림하심을 너희에게 알게 한 것이 교묘히 만든 이야기를 따른 것이 아니요 우리는 그의 크신 위엄을 친히 본 자라

sentences.original_text: that our Lord Jesus Christ is powerful
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 주 예수 그리스도는 강하다는 것을

sentences.original_text: that he will return to earth again
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 다시 지구에 돌아올 것이라는 것을

sentences.original_text: We were not telling you false stories
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 당신들에게 거짓 이야기를 한 것이 아니었습니다

sentences.original_text: that came from people's clever ideas
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 사람들의 현명한 생각에서 온 것이었습니다

sentences.original_text: that the Lord Jesus is very great
